actions.deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete
actions.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. All task files, including the spec, implementation plan, and any generated code, will be permanently removed from the project.

subtasks.afterPlanning: Implementation subtasks will appear here after planning

warnings.taskStuckDescription: This task is marked as running but no active process was found. This can happen if the application crashed or the process was stopped unexpectedly.
warnings.taskIncompleteDescription: This task has a spec and implementation plan but never completed any subtasks ({{completed}}/{{total}}). The process likely crashed during spec creation. Click Resume to continue with implementation.

dialogs.discardChanges: Are you sure you want to discard all changes for
